column1:
Overall Sentiment Percentages: 
Cleaniness: 57.456436% 
Amenities: 61.553415% 
Location: 60.471518% 
Services: 60.398317% 
General: 61.997740% 
Value: 57.956698%

Suggestions for Improvement: 
Cleaniness: Work towards consistently maintaining a high level of cleaniness each year. Ensure that all items and surfaces are regularly cleaned and sanitized.

Amenities: Ensure that the necessary amenities are provided to guests, such as bath and kitchen amenities, internet connection, and other important amenities that are expected.

Location: Look for ways to improve the access to the facility. Consider providing transportation to and from the facility if it is located in an area that is not easily accessible.

Services: Make sure that services provided by the facility are of the highest quality. Ensure that all guests are treated fairly and courteously.

General: Consider hosting events and activities for all guests, and work towards creating a more welcoming environment for guests.

Value: Analyze the value that guests are receiving from the facility and find ways to improve the value. Consider offering discounts to guests or reducing prices as appropriate.
